meanings.definition: The act or process of producing coins
meanings.sent1: The mintage of new coins requires precise machinery.
meanings.sent2: The mintage of quarters is done at the mint.
meanings.sent3: The mintage of coins is like a shiny assembly line.
meanings.sent4: The mintage of currency symbolizes a nation's stability.
meanings.sent5: The mintage of gold coins gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The total number of coins produced by a mint
meanings.sent1: The annual mintage of pennies is carefully recorded.
meanings.sent2: The mintage of silver dollars increased this year.
meanings.sent3: The mintage of coins can be a surprising figure.
meanings.sent4: The mintage of rare coins can fetch high prices.
meanings.sent5: The mintage of old coins tells a story of the past.

meanings.definition: The coins produced by a mint
meanings.sent1: The mintage from the mint was inspected for quality.
meanings.sent2: The mintage included both gold and silver coins.
meanings.sent3: The mintage of coins was like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent4: The mintage of commemorative coins was limited edition.
meanings.sent5: The mintage of ancient coins fascinated historians.
